Honestly, i just love this Game so much, i play it mostly with friends and have a great Time laughing and doing all kinds of stupid and random things.
Even if you only play Solo, you can meet alot of new Kind people, who you will then continue on playing with !
So if you'd ask me, i'd recommend this Game to you ALOT.
10/10
